main.name: Johan
main.subtitle2: I'm a front-end web developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. I'm focused on building responsive front-end web applications

about.subtitle2: I am not your normal developer
about.paragraph1: I specialize in building mobile responsive front-end UI applications that connect with API’s and other backend technologies. I’m passionate about learning new technologies. Though I am most proficient in building front-end applications using HTML, CSS, Javascript, and React, I am a quick learner and can pick up new tech stacks as needed.
about.paragraph2: I started web development by creating a website with some colleagues from the university to manage various processes within the institution. I have experience working directly with clients raising requirements, layout and designing processes until reaching the implementation. In my free time I try to collaborate with content and study various courses, both free and on platforms such as Platzi and Udemy.
about.paragraph3: Check out some of my lastest projects.

contact.description: I am available for freelance or full-time positions. Contact me and let's talk.

goloyalty.paragraph: This app is built with Angular and is hosted on Digital Ocean and Firebase API and Client respectively. The application is intended for businesses, to create a means of loyalty for their customers; With the purchase of products, customers accumulate points that can later be exchanged for products or services within the store.

quiniela.paragraph: This app is built with Next Js and is hosted on Linode and Netlify API and Client respectively. The application was developed as a practice with a partner, to manage a friendly competition where the scores of the World Cup matches or other leagues or sports are predicted.
